code: var fitMapToPins=function fitMapToPins(pins){var northEast={};var southWest={};return{northEast:northEast,southWest:southWest};};export var setMapHeight=function setMapHeight(mapHeight){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({mapHeight:mapHeight,type:'SET_MAP_HEIGHT'});};};export var pushPinAction=function pushPinAction(pin){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'PUSH_PIN',pin:pin});};};export var setPinsAction=function setPinsAction(pins){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'SET_PINS',pins:pins});};};export var clearPinsAction=function clearPinsAction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:'CLEAR_PINS'});dispatch({type:'SET_ELEVATION_DATA',elevationData:[]});dispatch({type:'SET_MAP_HEIGHT',mapHeight:'100vh'});};};export default pushPinAction;
